content: read through the pattern before you start this is my first attempt a weighting a pattern so there might be some mistakes if you find a mistake please let me know so i can fix it this project is easier to do if you already know how to do the crocodile stitch if you don t i reccomend this video https //youtu be/h0jobjcot5y don t forget to skip every other v_stitch this pattern can easily be changed to fit any size you can always add or subtract only subtract up to 12 stitches from your starting chain or use a larger or smaller hook
